name: web-desktop
description: A professional, feature-rich web-based desktop environment

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend -- --coverage && cd frontend && npm run test:coverage
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist frontend/dist backend/coverage frontend/coverage playwright-report test-results
